song.title: Miszter P likes Funky
song.info:
"Miszter P likes Funky"
Miszter P is a person I don't know. Probably he dwells in a dark deep cave in Ulgyflerp. Anyway he likes funky music, but some day he went crazy so now he's got nothing else to do but hunt the bats in his cave. Sorta weird? Yeh, me thinks so too.
The problem with Miszta P is that he can't focus on anything. Thoughts shoot through his brain in rapid succession.
One night, Miszta P dreamed all the s had become sz's and music was now used to paint city with many colours. He was not on any drugs.
Neither am I.
Vhiiula saysz bye ..
Send green pills and grey overalls to: vhiiula_gmx.net
Explanation: I think I'm in love
Miszter P likes Funky
Vhiiula in 2001
http://www.analogik.fr.fm
